EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder! - Webinar Training Invitation - Introducing HR-E Encoders
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reminder! - Join us for a webinar introducing the NEW HR-E 8-Dial Mechanical Encoder
When
Friday, June 6th (two options)
10:00 a.m. Central Register 2:00 p.m. Central Register
Presenter
Jan Boyer, marketing manager-metering, will be conducting a brief, quick-hitting webinar introducing the new High Resolution Encoder (HR-E).
Topic
The HR-E is the newest member in the Badger Meter high resolution family of encoders. The HR-E utilizes the same light-emitting diode technology of the ADE®, but combines proven technology with a finer reading resolution. Attend the webinar to learn more about the encoder’s features, requirements and sales strategy. This webinar will be recorded and posted on the extranet for viewing at a later date.
To register for the webinar:
1. Click the registration link for your preferred time above. 2. On the next page, Click "Register". 3. On the registration form, enter your information and then click "Submit".
Once your registration has been approved, you will receive a confirmation email message with instructions on how to join the event.
As always, we welcome your input. Please feel free to contact us with any comments or suggestions you may have. Submit Feedback
